classData.comment:
/**
         * Position the timeAxis at the left or right side.
         * Valid values are start & end.
         * start => left, end => right in LTR mode.
         * @member {String} timeAxisPosition_='start'
         */
classData.description:
Position the timeAxis at the left or right side.
Valid values are start & end.
start => left, end => right in LTR mode.
